name: Hydrax
overview: Hydrax is an adventure with action graphics. Use your mind to solve puzzles and riddles while exploring the vast underground world in your quest to find and defeat HYDRAX! Use your joystick and fighting skills to defeat various unfriendly creatures. You'll need all your skills in the final battle against the dreaded dragon. You have entered a large cavern rumored to host an ancient dragon on the lowest levels. The dragon is believed to guard a great treasure, and will stop at nothing to protect it. The player controls a character who can walk, duck, jump, and swing a sword. The player explores numerous rooms, but can also type commands to move and control their character. The player can pick up and drop items, and has a limited inventory capacity. The player must solve puzzles, and also defeat enemies.
